channel.title: [317]How do i change drop rate?
channel.description:
Ok , on my server ive been at gwd like 100 times and still got nothing as drop
I want to change drop rate... Its like on 1% or something... HOW DO I CHANGE THIS? I WANT VERY HIGH
The question is: How do i change xp rate

item.title: [317]How do i change drop rate?
item.dc:creator: @ProjectSix ProjectSix
item.description:
@ProjectSix wrote:

Find the gradoorns id from npcdrops.java W/E is, then there is expample
555 = ( 995 item) 1000 (1) change the 1 for your rate

Read full topic
